Name: Witch's Mystery
About the game: Summary This game is a card flip memory erasing game How to play: Players need to click two cards in a row. If the pattern is the same after flipping, they will be eliminated, and if they are eliminated, they will pass the level. After passing the level, you will unlock the beautiful CG in the gallery!
